Foreign guests arrive 
     Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party and Andria Velonandro Anselme, chairman of the Malagasy National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here on Wednesday to participate in the 15th meeting of the board of directors of the IIJI.
